wp:category.wp:category_description: Posts in this category test post formats.

wp:tag.wp:tag_description: Tags posts about articles you must read.
Tags posts about that nailed it.
Tags posts about things that cannot be unseen.

item.title: St. Louis Blues (1921)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: "St. Louis Blues (1921)" from Victor-18772 by Original Dixieland Jazz Band with Al Bernard. Released: 1921. Genre: Acoustic Era.

item.title: You wake up...
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [ut_united_video url="http://youtu.be/HkBTXwIt7Mw" caption="CHRIS ROBERTS IS BACK!" poster="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The hum of the fusion drive reverberates through the ship's hull. It reminds you that you should probably replace it soon. A quick check on the MobiGlas says there's an Aegis showroom on the planet you're heading to. Couldn't hurt to see what they got, right?
With the Credits you make delivering this cargo, you should be able to buy your ship a little treat. Besides, she's your bread and butter. You roll on your side and look out the window at the vast yawning space outside. A distant planet silently orbits a dying sun.

item.title: Your boards light up...
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [ut_united_video url="http://youtu.be/HkBTXwIt7Mw" caption="IMMERSION AND PLAYER CHOICE..." poster="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder1.jpg"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Contact. You kick off the berth and slide into the pilot seat, taking the ship off Auto as you do. Correction, three contacts, pretty far out. Vanduul never raid this far into the Empire... your heart sinks as you mutter to yourself: "Pirates."
You keep bearing and speed, keep shields at current levels. Don't do anything to make them think you're itching to fight. You never know, they might just pass on by. You can't tell what pack they belong to. You've run across pirates in the past, even done business with a few, maybe you'll get lucky...

item.title: Nope...
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[ut_united_video url="http://youtu.be/HkBTXwIt7Mw" caption="COMING TO A PC NEAR YOU..." poster="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder2.jpg"]
[ut_united_video url="http://youtu.be/HkBTXwIt7Mw" caption="ECONOMY AND PLAYER IMPACT..." poster="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
The three flash their engines and turn to engage you. You charge your shields up full and heat up your guns. You swear to yourself, if you make it through this, to hell with living on the straight and narrow. Times are too tight. You can't afford to keep losing loads. It keeps going like this, you might have to become a pirate tomorrow.
The pirates fan out in an attack formation... but first, you have to make it through today.

item.title: Life on the drift...
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[ut_united_video url="http://youtu.be/HkBTXwIt7Mw" caption="LIVE YOUR DREAM..." poster="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder3.jpg"]
[ut_united_video url="http://youtu.be/HkBTXwIt7Mw" caption="REAL PHYSICS, REAL CONSEQUENCES..." poster="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The man behind Wing Commander, Privateer, Strike Commander, Starlancer, Freelancer and more has assembled an elite team of industry veterans to build the Space Sim that we've all dreamed of: Star Citizen. With Chris at the helm, players can rest assured that they are supporting a game that will immerse them in a science fiction universe like nothing before.

item.title: Help be the architect of your dream...
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[ut_united_video url="http://youtu.be/HkBTXwIt7Mw" caption="THE POWER OF CROWFUNDING..." poster="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder4.jpg"]
[ut_united_video url="http://youtu.be/HkBTXwIt7Mw" caption="CITIZENSHIP HAS ITS PERKS" poster="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Becoming a part of Star Citizen now not only gives you the game when it's complete, but offers you a unique experience unlike any other game in the past. Our website features daily updates; including project discussions, concept art, fiction, and contact with the development team themselves.
Become a backer and have your voice heard with a level of access unprecedented in the history of games. Help the developers build the game we all want to play.

item.title: Want to reserve your ship?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [ut_pricing id="3487"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Pledge Packages are "pledge bundles" which will go directly toward helping us make Star Citizen a reality. What you get with each package is the actual Star Citizen game upon its release, access to beta modules that will be released up until the final product, a reservation of your own spaceship, and a variety of other add-on items. As a backer of the Star Citizen project, you will also gain access to all of the behind-the-scenes engineering and development processes of the game with updates happening daily. We are also surrounded by a vibrant community who all share the same excitement for a revolutionary new space-sim adventure and whom we frequently interact with. Pledge today and become a contributor to the development of the next-generation space-sim. Here are a few pledge options to start your journey:
RSI products can be found throughout the UEE at trusted, authorized ship dealers and stores.

In 2140, RSI premiered the first model of the Zeus, a quantum-drive equipped starship priced for private ownership. Now, almost nine hundred years later, RSI is still one of the most trusted and reliable names in ship manufacturing, building ships for the civilian population such as the Aurora and Constellation.

Roberts Space Industries has enjoyed a long and fruitful collaboration with the UEE military in the development of astroengineering tech in the defense of the public. RSI’s Capital Development Team is the only manufacturer trusted by the UEE Navy to build and deliver large-scale warships like the flagship Bengal-class carrier. While the Experimental Development Team is currently working on several classified contracts to deliver high-end technology for potential use in the UEE military.

The organization from which the company evolved, the Engine Development Team is constantly refining the quantum drive technology the company patented almost nine hundred years ago. Modern jump engines are made ever more efficient in each generation of development, with a significant safety increase part of each iteration. EDT also develops in-house power plant and thruster systems for RSI spacecraft, with the overall goal of reducing cost in constant pursuit of the founder’s dream of affordable private space travel.

The stars are RSI’s business so it only makes sense that the company would put navigation at the forefront of its production line. RSI avionics are perfectly tuned to work within the engineering parameters of their ships. RSI Avionic Systems are equipped with UEE-approved NavDrives, capable of accepting multiple formats for the navigation of charted jump points but also records flight data for new jump points.

item.title: SHIP STATS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [ut_showcase id="45"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: DISCLAIMER: These are our current specifications on paper. Some of this is likely to change during the 3D design and game balancing process over the next 24 months. Despite this, they should give a good indication of the relative features and abilities of the ships in the Star Citizen universe. LAST UPDATED: November 1st, 2014

item.title: THE M50 INTERCEPTOR
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The Origin M50 Interceptor [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] In-Hangar [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Back View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Engine View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"]  

The Manufacturers

  [ut_custom_box title="Origin Jumpworks, GmbH" logo="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" title_color="#ffae00" text_color="#999999" border_width="1" border_color="#a0c3d5" margin_top="0" padding_left="20" padding_top="20" padding_right="20" padding_bottom="10" border_style="solid" effect="fadeIn"] There is a place where beauty and power meet. The designers and engineers at Origin Jumpworks have spent the past two hundred years building the high-performance ships to take you there. While the price may seem high, you can rest assured that every ship that bears the Origin logo has been thoroughly refined. Owning an Origin craft is the beginning of your flight to perfection. [/ut_custom_box]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:5:{i:0;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:5:"Focus";s:5:"value";s:21:"Racing / Interception";}i:1;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:6:"Length";s:5:"value";s:9:"11 meters";}i:2;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:4:"Mass";s:5:"value";s:9:"12,000 Kg";}i:3;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:8:"Max Crew";s:5:"value";s:8:"1 person";}i:4;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:14:"Cargo Capacity";s:5:"value";s:15:"0 freight units";}}

If you want to get from point A to point B as quickly as possible and with as much style as possible then ORIGIN's M50 is for you. Featuring supercharged engines that counter a tiny weapons loadout, the M50 is a ship for going FAST.

item.title: THE F7C-M SUPER HORNET
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The F7C-M Super Hornet [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Front View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Back View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Flight Mode [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20" ] Cockpit View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Weapon loadout - 2x Klaus & Werner CF-117 Badger [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"]  

Variants matrix

  [ut_service_column headline="F7C-R Hornet Tracker" align="left" width="half" effect="slideInLeft" last="false"] If the Ghost is made to hide, the Tracker is made to seek. The F7C-R Tracker boasts an advanced radar suite making it ideal for deep-space explorers who require depth and accuracy in their scan packages. Local militia and larger merc units will also repurpose Trackers to act as mobile C&C ships for their squadrons. [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column headline="F7C-S Hornet Ghost" align="left" width="half" effect="slideInRight" last="true"]Through a combination of low-emission drives, low-draw weapons, and Void Armor technology capable of diffusing scans, The F7C-S Ghost is built for the pilot who wants to keep a low profile. The Ghost is capable of slipping past the most ardent of observers to accomplish whatever goal you need to accomplish. Don't worry, we won't ask. [/ut_service_column]  

The Manufacturers

  [ut_custom_box title="Anvil Aerospace" logo="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" title_color="#ffae00" text_color="#999999" border_width="1" border_color="#a0c3d5" margin_top="0" padding_left="20" padding_top="20" padding_right="20" padding_bottom="10" border_style="solid" effect="fadeIn"] Founded in 2772, Anvil has been reliably delivering military-grade equipment to the UEE navy for almost two centuries. The company has produced dozens of successful and iconic military spacecraft over the years, including the Hurricane, Osprey, Devastator, Hornet and Gladi¬ator. No military campaign in the last two centu¬ries has been launched without Anvil spacecraft in the forefront, and no carrier in UEE space today operates without at least a squadron of Anvil-designed fighters. On the civilian side, the Hornet is holding steady as the third best-selling single-seat spacecraft design available, trumped only by the Aurora and 300i. [/ut_custom_box]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The closest to the Military load-out as is legally possible for a Civilian model, the F7C-M Super Hornet reattaches the ball turret and offers near milspec parts under the hood. Proving that two heads are better than one, a second seat has been added to split the logistic and combat duty, making the Super Hornet a truly terrifying mark to engage.

item.title: THE CONSTELLATION ANDROMEDA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The RSI Constellation Andromeda [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Front View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Flight Mode [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Cockpit View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"]  

Variants matrix

  [ut_service_column headline="Constellation Taurus" align="left" width="half" effect="slideInLeft" last="false"] Enjoy the adventure of a multi-crew Constellation on a budget! The Constellation Taurus is a dedicated freighter. Fully configurable but without all the bells-and-whistles, the Taurus is a great way to get started with crewed ships. [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column headline="Constellation Aquila" align="left" width="half" effect="slideInRight" last="true"]Explore any distant horizons! The Constellation Aquila features a redesigned cockpit for maximum visibility, advanced sensors and an onboard Ursa rover for planetary exploration. Let’s see what’s out there! [/ut_service_column]  

The Manufacturers

  [ut_custom_box title="Roberts Space Industries (RSI)" logo="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" title_color="#ffae00" text_color="#999999" border_width="1" border_color="#a0c3d5" margin_top="0" padding_left="20" padding_top="20" padding_right="20" padding_bottom="10" border_style="solid" effect="fadeIn"] The original creators of the engine that kickstarted humanity's expansion into space, Roberts Space Industries build a wide range of spaceships that serve all needs starting at basic interstellar travel to deep exploration on the outer edges of the galaxy. The tagline is "Roberts Space Industries: Delivering the Stars since 2075" [/ut_custom_box]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The Constellation Andromeda, a multi-person freighter, is the most popular ship in RSI's current production array. Constellations are beloved by smugglers and merchants alike because they are modular, high powered... and just downright iconic-looking.

item.title: THE FREELANCER MAX
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The MISC Freelancer MAX [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" margin_bottom="20" effect="fadeIn" align="center"] Front View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Back View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" margin_bottom="20"] Cargo View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Flight Mode [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Cockpit View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"]  

Variants Matrix

  [ut_service_column headline="Freelancer DUR" align="left" width="half" effect="slideInLeft" last="false"] The Freelancer DUR variant specializes in exploration. Sacrificing 25% cargo capacity of the standard Freelancer for an enhanced jump drive, a more advanced scanner, and an expanded fuel tank may seem like a bad call to some, but those who value discovery over profit will find it to be their ship of choice. [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column headline="Freelancer MIS" align="left" width="half" effect="slideInRight" last="true"]The Freelancer MIS is a limited edition militarized variant of the classic mercantile ship developed by the UEE. These were produced in very small quantity due to some early payload incidents. This version sacrifices the majority of the cargo capacity to make way for missiles. [/ut_service_column]  

The Manufacturers

  [ut_custom_box title="Musashi Industrial & Starflight Concern (MISC)" logo="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" title_color="#ffae00" text_color="#999999" border_width="1" border_color="#a0c3d5" margin_top="0" padding_left="20" padding_top="20" padding_right="20" padding_bottom="10" border_style="solid" effect="fadeIn"] Before becoming one of the first Corps to attempt a crossborder merger with a Xi'An company, MISC has long been one of the most dependable names in hauling transports. Their efficient, modular designs are capable of handling cargo of all sizes and within all price-ranges making them the ideal craft of choice for independent traders and large corporations. [/ut_custom_box]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Freelancer variant with additional cargo capacity at the expense of weapons. The Freelancer MAX variant sacrifices weaponry for an increased cargo capacity making it ideal for equipment or raw materials transport.

item.title: Super Duper Audio Post
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: THE 300I
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The Origin Jumpworks 300i [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Front View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Back View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Flight Mode [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Cockpit View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"]  

Variants matrix

  [ut_service_column headline="315P" align="left" width="half" effect="slideInLeft" last="false"] Exploration is man's highest calling. Prepare to chart distant horizons with man's most sophisticated piece of technology, The ORIGIN 315P. Featuring a more robust power plant and a custom scanning package, exclusively designed by Chimera Communications. [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column headline="325A" align="left" width="half" effect="slideInRight" last="true"]Just because it's a rough galaxy doesn't mean you need to sacrifice your comfort: The 325A can come out on top in any dogfight. The 325a features an advanced weapon payload as well as a custom targeting system designed especially for The 325A by WillsOp. [/ut_service_column]  

The Manufacturers

  [ut_custom_box title="Origin Jumpworks, GmbH" logo="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" title_color="#ffae00" text_color="#999999" border_width="1" border_color="#a0c3d5" margin_top="0" padding_left="20" padding_top="20" padding_right="20" padding_bottom="10" border_style="solid" effect="fadeIn"] There is a place where beauty and power meet. The designers and engineers at Origin Jumpworks have spent the past two hundred years building the high-performance ships to take you there. While the price may seem high, you can rest assured that every ship that bears the Origin logo has been thoroughly refined. Owning an Origin craft is the beginning of your flight to perfection. [/ut_custom_box]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: If you're going to travel the stars... why not do it in style? The 300i is Origin Jumpworks' premiere luxury spacecraft. It is a sleek, silver killer that sends as much of a message with its silhouette as it does with its weaponry.

a:5:{i:0;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:5:"Focus";s:5:"value";s:7:"Touring";}i:1;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:6:"Length";s:5:"value";s:9:"24 meters";}i:2;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:4:"Mass";s:5:"value";s:9:"20,085 Kg";}i:3;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:8:"Max Crew";s:5:"value";s:8:"1 person";}i:4;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:14:"Cargo Capacity";s:5:"value";s:16:"16 freight units";}}

item.title: THE AURORA ES
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Front View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Back View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Flight Mode [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"] Cockpit View [ut_animate_image image="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" effect="fadeIn" align="center" margin_bottom="20"]  

Variants matrix

  [ut_service_column headline="Aurora LX" align="left" width="half" effect="slideInLeft" last="false"] Be proud of your roots with the brand-new Aurora Deluxe, built for the discerning pilot who never forgets where he or she came from. The Aurora LX features patent leather interior to guarantee comfort for those long stretches in the deep black. [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column headline="Aurora MR" align="left" width="half" effect="slideInRight" last="true"]Perhaps you're looking for something that offers carrying capacity but has combat capabilities too? The Aurora Marque comes with a pair of Behring-quality lasers and a high quality gun cooler system. [/ut_service_column]  

The Manufacturers

  [ut_custom_box title="Roberts Space Industries (RSI)" logo="http://themeforest.unitedthemes.com/wpversions/brooklyn/xml/demo12/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/placeholder.jpg" title_color="#ffae00" text_color="#999999" border_width="1" border_color="#a0c3d5" margin_top="0" padding_left="20" padding_top="20" padding_right="20" padding_bottom="10" border_style="solid" effect="fadeIn"] The original creators of the engine that kickstarted humanity's expansion into space, Roberts Space Industries build a wide range of spaceships that serve all needs starting at basic interstellar travel to deep exploration on the outer edges of the galaxy. The tagline is "Roberts Space Industries: Delivering the Stars since 2075" [/ut_custom_box]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: a:5:{i:0;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:5:"Focus";s:5:"value";s:19:"Starter/Exploration";}i:1;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:6:"Length";s:5:"value";s:9:"19 meters";}i:2;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:4:"Mass";s:5:"value";s:8:"7,550 Kg";}i:3;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:8:"Max Crew";s:5:"value";s:8:"1 person";}i:4;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:14:"Cargo Capacity";s:5:"value";s:16:"16 freight units";}}

The Aurora is the modern day descendant of the Roberts Space Industries X-7 spacecraft which tested the very first jump engines. Utilitarian to a T, the Aurora is the perfect beginner's ship: what it lacks in style it makes up for in ample room for upgrade modules.
